poem:
Tour Announcement

Toronto speaks,
    a whisper
          drifting—
soldiers assemble
    in Chicago's echo.

New Jersey
    waits,
          holding breath—

wishes
    hang, a careful ensemble,
               across the pulse
                      of crowded streets

the horizon hums,
      promises
                    etched in light

August leans in.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Oasis announce world tour dates with concerts in the US, Canada and Mexico Oasis have announced that their reunion tour will take them to the US, Canada and Mexico in August and September 2025. The band previously teased the news on billboards in New York, Toronto, Chicago and other cities. “Be careful what you wish for,” the advertisements said. They will play Toronto Rogers Stadium on 24 August, Chicago Soldier Field on 28August, New Jersey". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: Oasis announce world tour dates with concerts in the US, Canada and Mexico Oasis have announced that their reunion tour will take them to the US, Canada and Mexico in August and September 2025. The band previously teased the news on billboards in New York, Toronto, Chicago and other cities. “Be careful what you wish for,” the advertisements said. They will play Toronto Rogers Stadium on 24 August, Chicago Soldier Field on 28August, New Jersey
